text: William Cross (17 June 1883 – 12 April 1949) was a Scottish professional football outside forward who played in the Scottish League for Third Lanark and Port Glasgow Athletic. He also played for Southern League clubs Brentford and Queens Park Rangers and represented the Southern League XI. == Personal life == Cross was the brother of fellow Third Lanark and Queens Park Rangers footballer John Cross. == Career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition !
